title: Pita Pit
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast food franchise offering pita pocket sandwiches, smoothies, salads and more. Custom make your bowl by choosing the fillings. Vegan choices include fresh veggies, hummus, a black bean burger, and falafel. Charts in the store show vegan items.
